  • public class Enemy
extends greenfoot.Actor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Enemy()
      Sets the image for the Enemy with the size 40,40

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void act()
      method checkforpath() checks if the Enemy still is on the path, method checkforcollision() checks if the Enemy touches the Player
      void checkforcollision()
      Checks if the Enemy touches the Player, if so remove Player, show the Gameoverscreen and stop the game
      void checkforpath()
      Move with the speed of 2 for the whole time, if the Enemy leaves the path, turn with a random number between 0 and 14
      Point eyePosition​(int angle, int distance)
      Return the position of an eye.
      Point leftEye()
      Return the position of the left eye
      Point rightEye()
      Return the position of the right eye

      • act

        public void act()
        method checkforpath() checks if the Enemy still is on the path, method checkforcollision() checks if the Enemy touches the Player
        Overrides:

      • checkforpath

        public void checkforpath()
        Move with the speed of 2 for the whole time, if the Enemy leaves the path, turn with a random number between 0 and 14

      • checkforcollision

        public void checkforcollision()
        Checks if the Enemy touches the Player, if so remove Player, show the Gameoverscreen and stop the game

        Return the position of the left eye

      • eyePosition

        public Point eyePosition​(int angle,
                         int distance)
        Return the position of an eye. The parameters define the eye's location fon the Enemy's body.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle of the vector to the eye from the current rotation.
        distance - The distance of the eye from our centre point.
        Returns:
        The Point (in global coordinates) where the eye is.
